message.content:
cs.RO, cs.SY, cs.MA, cs.NI, cs.AI. 

This paper describes a cooperative localization algorithm for a team of mobile unmanned robotic vehicles, which falls under the field of robotics (cs.RO). The algorithm uses event-triggered estimation, which involves decision-making based on certain conditions, and thus can be categorized under systems and control (cs.SY). The use of Covariance Intersection (CI) mechanism for synchronization and balancing dynamics for error control suggests that this paper can also be classified under mathematical aspects of robotics (cs.MA). The paper also involves the use of artificial intelligence techniques for state estimation, which can be categorized under artificial intelligence (cs.AI). Finally, the examination of the robustness of the proposed approach to lossy communications suggests that this paper can also be classified under networking and internet architecture (cs.NI).
